com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.schema

Interface RelationTypeIndex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Namifiable, TitanIndex, TitanSchemaElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RelationTypeIndexWrapper

    public interface RelationTypeIndex
extends TitanIndex
    A RelationTypeIndex is an index installed on a RelationType to speed up vertex-centric indexes for that type. A RelationTypeIndex is created via TitanManagement.buildEdgeIndex(com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.EdgeLabel, String, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Direction, com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.Order, com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.RelationType...) for edge labels and TitanManagement.buildPropertyIndex(com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.PropertyKey, String, com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.Order, com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.RelationType...) for property keys.

    This interface allows the inspection of already defined RelationTypeIndex'es. An existing index on a RelationType can be retrieved via TitanManagement.getRelationIndex(com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.RelationType, String).

    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

        getName

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        RelationType getType()
        Returns the RelationType on which this index is installed.
        Returns:

      • getSortOrder

        Order getSortOrder()
        Returns the sort order of this index. Index entries are sorted in this order and queries which use this sort order will be faster.
        Returns:

      • getSortKey

        RelationType[] getSortKey()
        Returns the (composite) sort key for this index. The composite sort key is an ordered list of RelationTypes
        Returns:

      • getDirection

        com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Direction getDirection()
        Returns the direction on which this index is installed. An index may cover only one or both directions.
        Returns:

      • getIndexStatus

        SchemaStatus getIndexStatus()
        Returns the status of this index
        Returns:
